pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tandem Clustering with Invariant Coordinate Selection // Implementation of tandem clustering with invariant coordinate selection with different scatter matrices and several choices for the selection of components as described in Alfons, A., Archimbaud, A., Nordhausen, K.and Ruiz-Gazen, A. (2024) doi:10.1016/j.ecosta.2024.03.002.
